attributes.action: prime minister must resign if scotland goes independent
attributes.additional_details:
IF scotland votes for independence in their september the 18th referendum thus ending the long union we have had with them.

david cameron has absolutely no choice he MUST resign as prime minister with immediate effect. He has been the prime minister when the break up of the union has happened.

there is absolutely no way he could stay his position would be untenable if scotland does indeed choose to go independent he must resign...
